Project-Related Questions

Common questions about our project implementation process

Project timelines vary by complexity: ETP systems (3-6 months), CETP installations (6-12 months), ZLD systems (4-8 months), and MVRE plants (2-4 months). We provide detailed project schedules during the design phase.

Yes, we offer comprehensive O&M services including operator training, maintenance schedules, spare parts supply, and 24/7 technical support. We also provide performance monitoring and optimization services.

Our projects comply with CPCB norms, state pollution control board requirements, and international standards like ISO 14001. We ensure all installations meet or exceed environmental discharge standards.

Absolutely! We specialize in system upgrades and retrofits. Our team can assess existing systems and implement improvements to enhance efficiency, reduce operating costs, and ensure compliance with updated regulations.
